canceled_at.description: The date with timezone at which the Payment was canceled.

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

currency_code.description: The 3 character ISO currency code of the payment.

externalDocs.description: See a list of codes.

data.description: The data required for the Payment Provider to identify, modify and process the Payment. Typically this will be an object that holds an id to the external payment session, but can be an empty object if the Payment Provider doesn't hold any state.

idempotency_key.description: Randomly generated key used to continue the completion of a payment in case of failure.

externalDocs.description: Learn more how to use the idempotency key.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

MoneyAmount25.title: Money Amount
MoneyAmount25.description: A Money Amount represent a price amount, for example, a product variant's price or a price in a price list. Each Money Amount either has a Currency or Region associated with it to indicate the pricing in a given Currency or, for fully region-based pricing, the given price in a specific Region. If region-based pricing is used, the amount will be in the currency defined for the Region.

amount.description: The amount in the smallest currecny unit (e.g. cents 100 cents to charge $1) that the Product Variant will cost.

min_quantity.description: The minimum quantity that the Money Amount applies to. If this value is not set, the Money Amount applies to all quantities.

max_quantity.description: The maximum quantity that the Money Amount applies to. If this value is not set, the Money Amount applies to all quantities.

price_list_id.description: The ID of the price list that the money amount may belong to.

price_list.description: The details of the price list that the money amount may belong to.

variant_id.description: The ID of the Product Variant contained in the Line Item.

variant.description: The details of the product variant that the money amount may belong to.

region_id.description: The region's ID

region.description: The details of the region that the money amount may belong to.

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

deleted_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was deleted.

currency_code.description: The 3 character currency code that the money amount may belong to.

externalDocs.description: See a list of codes.

ProductVariant26.title: Product Variant
ProductVariant26.description: A Product Variant represents a Product with a specific set of Product Option configurations. The maximum number of Product Variants that a Product can have is given by the number of available Product Option combinations. A product must at least have one product variant.

title.description: A title that can be displayed for easy identification of the Product Variant.

product_id.description: The ID of the product that the product variant belongs to.

product.description: The details of the product that the product variant belongs to.

sku.description: The unique stock keeping unit used to identify the Product Variant. This will usually be a unique identifer for the item that is to be shipped, and can be referenced across multiple systems.

barcode.description: A generic field for a GTIN number that can be used to identify the Product Variant.

ean.description: An EAN barcode number that can be used to identify the Product Variant.

upc.description: A UPC barcode number that can be used to identify the Product Variant.

inventory_quantity.description: The current quantity of the item that is stocked.

allow_backorder.description: Whether the Product Variant should be purchasable when `inventory_quantity` is 0.

manage_inventory.description: Whether Medusa should manage inventory for the Product Variant.

hs_code.description: The Harmonized System code of the Product Variant. May be used by Fulfillment Providers to pass customs information to shipping carriers.

origin_country.description: The country in which the Product Variant was produced. May be used by Fulfillment Providers to pass customs information to shipping carriers.

mid_code.description: The Manufacturers Identification code that identifies the manufacturer of the Product Variant. May be used by Fulfillment Providers to pass customs information to shipping carriers.

material.description: The material and composition that the Product Variant is made of, May be used by Fulfillment Providers to pass customs information to shipping carriers.

weight.description: The weight of the Product Variant. May be used in shipping rate calculations.

length.description: The length of the Product Variant. May be used in shipping rate calculations.

height.description: The height of the Product Variant. May be used in shipping rate calculations.

width.description: The width of the Product Variant. May be used in shipping rate calculations.

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

deleted_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was deleted.

purchasable.description:
Only used with the inventory modules.
A boolean value indicating whether the Product Variant is purchasable.
A variant is purchasable if:
  - inventory is not managed
  - it has no inventory items
  - it is in stock
  - it is backorderable.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

options.description: The details of the product options that this product variant defines values for.

inventory_items.description: The details inventory items of the product variant.

prices.description: The details of the prices of the Product Variant, each represented as a Money Amount. Each Money Amount represents a price in a given currency or a specific Region.

original_price.description: The original price of the variant without any discounted prices applied.

calculated_price.description: The calculated price of the variant. Can be a discounted price.

original_price_incl_tax.description: The original price of the variant including taxes.

calculated_price_incl_tax.description: The calculated price of the variant including taxes.

original_tax.description: The taxes applied on the original price.

calculated_tax.description: The taxes applied on the calculated price.

tax_rates.description: An array of applied tax rates

name.description: The name of the tax rate

code.description: The code of the tax rate

ProductOption28.title: Product Option
ProductOption28.description: A Product Option defines properties that may vary between different variants of a Product. Common Product Options are "Size" and "Color". Admins are free to create any product options.

title.description: The title that the Product Option is defined by (e.g. `Size`).

product_id.description: The ID of the product that this product option belongs to.

product.description: The details of the product that this product option belongs to.

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

deleted_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was deleted.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

values.description: The details of the values of the product option.

variants.description: An array of product variant descriptions.

ShippingOptionRequirement29.title: Shipping Option Requirement
ShippingOptionRequirement29.description: A shipping option requirement defines conditions that a Cart must satisfy for the Shipping Option to be available for usage in the Cart.

shipping_option_id.description: The ID of the shipping option that the requirements belong to.

shipping_option.description: The details of the shipping option that the requirements belong to.

amount.description: The amount to compare the Cart subtotal to.

deleted_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was deleted.

type.description: The type of the requirement, this defines how the value will be compared to the Cart's total. `min_subtotal` requirements define the minimum subtotal that is needed for the Shipping Option to be available, while the `max_subtotal` defines the maximum subtotal that the Cart can have for the Shipping Option to be available.

ShippingOption30.title: Shipping Option
ShippingOption30.description: A Shipping Option represents a way in which an Order or Return can be shipped. Shipping Options have an associated Fulfillment Provider that will be used when the fulfillment of an Order is initiated. Shipping Options themselves cannot be added to Carts, but serve as a template for Shipping Methods. This distinction makes it possible to customize individual Shipping Methods with additional information.

name.description: The name given to the Shipping Option - this may be displayed to the Customer.

region_id.description: The ID of the region this shipping option can be used in.

region.description: The details of the region this shipping option can be used in.

profile_id.description: The ID of the Shipping Profile that the shipping option belongs to.

provider_id.description: The ID of the fulfillment provider that will be used to later to process the shipping method created from this shipping option and its fulfillments.

amount.description: The amount to charge for shipping when the Shipping Option price type is `flat_rate`.

is_return.description: Flag to indicate if the Shipping Option can be used for Return shipments.

admin_only.description: Flag to indicate if the Shipping Option usage is restricted to admin users.

includes_tax.description: Whether the shipping option price include tax

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

deleted_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was deleted.

price_type.description: The type of pricing calculation that is used when creatin Shipping Methods from the Shipping Option. Can be `flat_rate` for fixed prices or `calculated` if the Fulfillment Provider can provide price calulations.

data.description: The data needed for the Fulfillment Provider to identify the Shipping Option.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

requirements.description: The details of the requirements that must be satisfied for the Shipping Option to be available for usage in a Cart.

tax_rates.description: An array of applied tax rates

name.description: The name of the tax rate

code.description: The code of the tax rate

shipping_options.description: An array of shipping options details.
An array of shipping options details.

ShippingMethod31.title: Shipping Method
ShippingMethod31.description: A Shipping Method represents a way in which an Order or Return can be shipped. Shipping Methods are created from a Shipping Option, but may contain additional details that can be necessary for the Fulfillment Provider to handle the shipment. If the shipping method is created for a return, it may be associated with a claim or a swap that the return is part of.

shipping_option_id.description: The ID of the Shipping Option that the Shipping Method is built from.

order_id.description: The ID of the order that the shipping method is used in.

order.description: The details of the order that the shipping method is used in.

claim_order_id.description: The ID of the claim that the shipping method is used in.

claim_order.description: The details of the claim that the shipping method is used in.

cart_id.description: The ID of the cart that the shipping method is used in.

cart.description: The details of the cart that the shipping method is used in.

swap_id.description: The ID of the swap that the shipping method is used in.

swap.description: The details of the swap that the shipping method is used in.

return_id.description: The ID of the return that the shipping method is used in.

return_order.description: The details of the return that the shipping method is used in.

price.description: The amount to charge for the Shipping Method. The currency of the price is defined by the Region that the Order that the Shipping Method belongs to is a part of.

includes_tax.description: Whether the shipping method price include tax

total.description: The total amount of the shipping

data.description: Additional data that the Fulfillment Provider needs to fulfill the shipment. This is used in combination with the Shipping Options data, and may contain information such as a drop point id.

tax_lines.description: The details of the tax lines applied on the shipping method.

DiscountRule32.title: Discount Rule
DiscountRule32.description: A discount rule defines how a Discount is calculated when applied to a Cart.

description.description: A short description of the discount

value.description: The value that the discount represents; this will depend on the type of the discount

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

deleted_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was deleted.

type.description: The type of the Discount, can be `fixed` for discounts that reduce the price by a fixed amount, `percentage` for percentage reductions or `free_shipping` for shipping vouchers.

allocation.description: The scope that the discount should apply to.

conditions.description: The details of the discount conditions associated with the rule. They can be used to limit when the discount can be used.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

SalesChannelLocation33.title: Sales Channel Stock Location
SalesChannelLocation33.description: This represents the association between a sales channel and a stock locations.

id.description: The Sales Channel Stock Location's ID

sales_channel_id.description: The ID of the Sales Channel

location_id.description: The ID of the Location Stock.

sales_channel.description: The details of the sales channel the location is associated with.

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

deleted_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was deleted.

SalesChannel34.title: Sales Channel
SalesChannel34.description: A Sales Channel is a method a business offers its products for purchase for the customers. For example, a Webshop can be a sales channel, and a mobile app can be another.

name.description: The name of the sales channel.

description.description: The description of the sales channel.

is_disabled.description: Specify if the sales channel is enabled or disabled.

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

deleted_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was deleted.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

locations.description: The details of the stock locations related to the sales channel.

Product35.title: Product
Product35.description: A product is a saleable item that holds general information such as name or description. It must include at least one Product Variant, where each product variant defines different options to purchase the product with (for example, different sizes or colors). The prices and inventory of the product are defined on the variant level.

title.description: A title that can be displayed for easy identification of the Product.

subtitle.description: An optional subtitle that can be used to further specify the Product.

description.description: A short description of the Product.

handle.description: A unique identifier for the Product (e.g. for slug structure).

is_giftcard.description: Whether the Product represents a Gift Card. Products that represent Gift Cards will automatically generate a redeemable Gift Card code once they are purchased.

thumbnail.description: A URL to an image file that can be used to identify the Product.

profile_id.description: The ID of the shipping profile that the product belongs to. The shipping profile has a set of defined shipping options that can be used to fulfill the product.

weight.description: The weight of the Product Variant. May be used in shipping rate calculations.

length.description: The length of the Product Variant. May be used in shipping rate calculations.

height.description: The height of the Product Variant. May be used in shipping rate calculations.

width.description: The width of the Product Variant. May be used in shipping rate calculations.

hs_code.description: The Harmonized System code of the Product Variant. May be used by Fulfillment Providers to pass customs information to shipping carriers.

origin_country.description: The country in which the Product Variant was produced. May be used by Fulfillment Providers to pass customs information to shipping carriers.

mid_code.description: The Manufacturers Identification code that identifies the manufacturer of the Product Variant. May be used by Fulfillment Providers to pass customs information to shipping carriers.

material.description: The material and composition that the Product Variant is made of, May be used by Fulfillment Providers to pass customs information to shipping carriers.

collection_id.description: The ID of the product collection that the product belongs to.

type_id.description: The ID of the product type that the product belongs to.

discountable.description: Whether the Product can be discounted. Discounts will not apply to Line Items of this Product when this flag is set to `false`.

external_id.description: The external ID of the product

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

deleted_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was deleted.

status.description: The status of the product

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

categories.description: The details of the product categories that this product belongs to.

profiles.description: Available if the relation `profiles` is expanded.

tags.description: The details of the product tags used in this product.

images.description: The details of the product's images.

options.description: The details of the Product Options that are defined for the Product. The product's variants will have a unique combination of values of the product's options.

sales_channels.description: The details of the sales channels this product is available in.

variants.description: The details of the Product Variants that belong to the Product. Each will have a unique combination of values of the product's options.
The product variants and their prices.

StoreProductsListRes.description: The list of products with pagination fields.

count.description: The total number of items available

offset.description: The number of products skipped when retrieving the products.

limit.description: The number of items per page

products.description: An array of products details.

TaxRate37.title: Tax Rate
TaxRate37.description: A Tax Rate can be used to define a custom rate to charge on specified products, product types, and shipping options within a given region.

code.description: A code to identify the tax type by

name.description: A human friendly name for the tax

region_id.description: The ID of the region that the rate belongs to.

region.description: The details of the region that the rate belongs to.

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

product_types.description: The details of the product types that belong to this tax rate.

shipping_options.description: The details of the shipping options that belong to this tax rate.

products.description: The details of the products that belong to this tax rate.

Region38.title: Region
Region38.description: A region holds settings specific to a geographical location, including the currency, tax rates, and fulfillment and payment providers. A Region can consist of multiple countries to accomodate common shopping settings across countries.

name.description: The name of the region as displayed to the customer. If the Region only has one country it is recommended to write the country name.

tax_rate.description: The tax rate that should be charged on purchases in the Region.

tax_code.description: The tax code used on purchases in the Region. This may be used by other systems for accounting purposes.

gift_cards_taxable.description: Whether the gift cards are taxable or not in this region.

automatic_taxes.description: Whether taxes should be automated in this region.

tax_provider_id.description: The ID of the tax provider used in this region

includes_tax.description: Whether the prices for the region include tax

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

deleted_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was deleted.

currency_code.description: The three character currency code used in the region.

externalDocs.description: See a list of codes.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

countries.description: The details of the countries included in this region.

payment_providers.description: The details of the payment providers that can be used to process payments in the region.

fulfillment_providers.description: The details of the fulfillment providers that can be used to fulfill items of orders and similar resources in the region.

tax_rates.description: The details of the tax rates used in the region, aside from the default rate.

StoreRegionsListRes.description: The list of regions with pagination fields.

count.description: The total number of items available

offset.description: The number of regions skipped when retrieving the regions.

limit.description: The number of items per page

GiftCard39.title: Gift Card
GiftCard39.description: Gift Cards are redeemable and represent a value that can be used towards the payment of an Order.

code.description: The unique code that identifies the Gift Card. This is used by the Customer to redeem the value of the Gift Card.

value.description: The value that the Gift Card represents.

balance.description: The remaining value on the Gift Card.

region_id.description: The ID of the region this gift card is available in.

order_id.description: The ID of the order that the gift card was purchased in.

order.description: The details of the order that the gift card was purchased in.

is_disabled.description: Whether the Gift Card has been disabled. Disabled Gift Cards cannot be applied to carts.

ends_at.description: The time at which the Gift Card can no longer be used.

tax_rate.description: The gift card's tax rate that will be applied on calculating totals

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

deleted_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was deleted.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

Discount40.title: Discount
Discount40.description: A discount can be applied to a cart for promotional purposes.

code.description: A unique code for the discount - this will be used by the customer to apply the discount

is_dynamic.description: A flag to indicate if multiple instances of the discount can be generated. I.e. for newsletter discounts

rule_id.description: The ID of the discount rule that defines how the discount will be applied to a cart.

is_disabled.description: Whether the Discount has been disabled. Disabled discounts cannot be applied to carts

parent_discount_id.description: The Discount that the discount was created from. This will always be a dynamic discount

parent_discount.description: The details of the parent discount that this discount was created from.

starts_at.description: The time at which the discount can be used.

ends_at.description: The time at which the discount can no longer be used.

usage_limit.description: The maximum number of times that a discount can be used.

usage_count.description: The number of times a discount has been used.

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

deleted_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was deleted.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

regions.description: The details of the regions in which the Discount can be used.

LineItemAdjustment41.title: Line Item Adjustment
LineItemAdjustment41.description: A Line Item Adjustment includes details on discounts applied on a line item.

item_id.description: The ID of the line item

item.description: The details of the line item.

description.description: The line item's adjustment description

discount_id.description: The ID of the discount associated with the adjustment

amount.description: The adjustment amount

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

LineItem42.title: Line Item
LineItem42.description: Line Items are created when a product is added to a Cart. When Line Items are purchased they will get copied to the resulting order, swap, or claim, and can eventually be referenced in Fulfillments and Returns. Line items may also be used for order edits.

cart_id.description: The ID of the cart that the line item may belongs to.

cart.description: The details of the cart that the line item may belongs to.

order_id.description: The ID of the order that the line item may belongs to.

order.description: The details of the order that the line item may belongs to.

swap_id.description: The ID of the swap that the line item may belong to.

swap.description: The details of the swap that the line item may belong to.

claim_order_id.description: The ID of the claim that the line item may belong to.

claim_order.description: The details of the claim that the line item may belong to.

original_item_id.description: The ID of the original line item. This is useful if the line item belongs to a resource that references an order, such as a return or an order edit.

order_edit_id.description: The ID of the order edit that the item may belong to.

order_edit.description: The details of the order edit.

title.description: The title of the Line Item.

description.description: A more detailed description of the contents of the Line Item.

thumbnail.description: A URL string to a small image of the contents of the Line Item.

is_giftcard.description: Flag to indicate if the Line Item is a Gift Card.

should_merge.description: Flag to indicate if new Line Items with the same variant should be merged or added as an additional Line Item.

allow_discounts.description: Flag to indicate if the Line Item should be included when doing discount calculations.

has_shipping.description: Flag to indicate if the Line Item has fulfillment associated with it.

unit_price.description: The price of one unit of the content in the Line Item. This should be in the currency defined by the Cart/Order/Swap/Claim that the Line Item belongs to.

variant_id.description: The id of the Product Variant contained in the Line Item.

quantity.description: The quantity of the content in the Line Item.

fulfilled_quantity.description: The quantity of the Line Item that has been fulfilled.

returned_quantity.description: The quantity of the Line Item that has been returned.

shipped_quantity.description: The quantity of the Line Item that has been shipped.

refundable.description: The amount that can be refunded from the given Line Item. Takes taxes and discounts into consideration.

subtotal.description: The subtotal of the line item

tax_total.description: The total of tax of the line item

total.description: The total amount of the line item

original_total.description: The original total amount of the line item

original_tax_total.description: The original tax total amount of the line item

discount_total.description: The total of discount of the line item rounded

raw_discount_total.description: The total of discount of the line item

gift_card_total.description: The total of the gift card of the line item

includes_tax.description: Indicates if the line item unit_price include tax

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

tax_lines.description: The details of the item's tax lines.

adjustments.description: The details of the item's adjustments, which are available when a discount is applied on the item.

Swap43.title: Swap
Swap43.description: A swap can be created when a Customer wishes to exchange Products that they have purchased with different Products. It consists of a Return of previously purchased Products and a Fulfillment of new Products. It also includes information on any additional payment or refund required based on the difference between the exchanged products.

order_id.description: The ID of the order that the swap belongs to.

order.description: The details of the order that the swap belongs to.

return_order.description: The details of the return that belongs to the swap, which holds the details on the items being returned.

payment.description: The details of the additional payment authorized by the customer when `difference_due` is positive.

difference_due.description: The difference amount between the order’s original total and the new total imposed by the swap. If its value is negative, a refund must be issues to the customer. If it's positive, additional payment must be authorized by the customer. Otherwise, no payment processing is required.

shipping_address_id.description: The Address to send the new Line Items to - in most cases this will be the same as the shipping address on the Order.

cart_id.description: The ID of the cart that the customer uses to complete the swap.

cart.description: The details of the cart that the customer uses to complete the swap.

confirmed_at.description: The date with timezone at which the Swap was confirmed by the Customer.

canceled_at.description: The date with timezone at which the Swap was canceled.

no_notification.description: If set to true, no notification will be sent related to this swap

allow_backorder.description: If true, swaps can be completed with items out of stock

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

deleted_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was deleted.

fulfillment_status.description: The status of the Fulfillment of the Swap.

payment_status.description: The status of the Payment of the Swap. The payment may either refer to the refund of an amount or the authorization of a new amount.

fulfillments.description: The details of the fulfillments that are used to send the new items to the customer.

idempotency_key.description: Randomly generated key used to continue the completion of the swap in case of failure.

externalDocs.description: Learn more how to use the idempotency key.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

shipping_methods.description: The details of the shipping methods used to fulfill the additional items purchased.

additional_items.description: The details of the new products to send to the customer, represented as line items.

Cart44.title: Cart
Cart44.description: A cart represents a virtual shopping bag. It can be used to complete an order, a swap, or a claim.

email.description: The email associated with the cart

region_id.description: The region's ID

customer.description: The details of the customer the cart belongs to.

payment_session.description: The details of the selected payment session in the cart.

payment.description: The details of the payment associated with the cart.

completed_at.description: The date with timezone at which the cart was completed.

payment_authorized_at.description: The date with timezone at which the payment was authorized.

sales_channel_id.description: The sales channel ID the cart is associated with.

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

deleted_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was deleted.

item_tax_total.description: The total of items with taxes

shipping_tax_total.description: The total of shipping with taxes

refunded_total.description: The total amount refunded if the order associated with this cart is returned.

total.description: The total amount of the cart

refundable_amount.description: The amount that can be refunded

gift_card_tax_total.description: The total of gift cards with taxes

payment_sessions.description: The details of all payment sessions created on the cart.

type.description: The cart's type.

idempotency_key.description: Randomly generated key used to continue the completion of a cart in case of failure.

externalDocs.description: Learn more how to use the idempotency key.

context.description: The context of the cart which can include info like IP or user agent.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

shipping_methods.description: The details of the shipping methods added to the cart.

gift_cards.description: An array of details of all gift cards applied to the cart.

discounts.description: An array of details of all discounts applied to the cart.

items.description: The line items added to the cart.

Order45.title: Order
Order45.description: An order is a purchase made by a customer. It holds details about payment and fulfillment of the order. An order may also be created from a draft order, which is created by an admin user.

cart_id.description: The ID of the cart associated with the order

cart.description: The details of the cart associated with the order.

customer_id.description: The ID of the customer associated with the order

customer.description: The details of the customer associated with the order.

email.description: The email associated with the order

billing_address_id.description: The ID of the billing address associated with the order

shipping_address_id.description: The ID of the shipping address associated with the order

region_id.description: The ID of the region this order was created in.

draft_order_id.description: The ID of the draft order this order was created from.

draft_order.description: The details of the draft order this order was created from.

canceled_at.description: The date the order was canceled on.

no_notification.description: Flag for describing whether or not notifications related to this should be send.

external_id.description: The ID of an external order.

sales_channel_id.description: The ID of the sales channel this order belongs to.

shipping_tax_total.description: The tax total applied on shipping

item_tax_total.description: The tax total applied on items

refunded_total.description: The total amount refunded if the order is returned.

total.description: The total amount of the order

refundable_amount.description: The amount that can be refunded

gift_card_tax_total.description: The total of gift cards with taxes

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

status.description: The order's status

currency_code.description: The 3 character currency code that is used in the order

externalDocs.description: See a list of codes.

payments.description: The details of the payments used in the order.

fulfillments.description: The details of the fulfillments created for the order.

returns.description: The details of the returns created for the order.

claims.description: The details of the claims created for the order.

refunds.description: The details of the refunds created for the order.

swaps.description: The details of the swaps created for the order.

edits.description: The details of the order edits done on the order.

idempotency_key.description: Randomly generated key used to continue the processing of the order in case of failure.

externalDocs.description: Learn more how to use the idempotency key.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

gift_card_transactions.description: The gift card transactions made in the order.

shipping_methods.description: The details of the shipping methods used in the order.

discounts.description: The details of the discounts applied on the order.

gift_cards.description: The details of the gift card used in the order.

returnable_items.description: The details of the line items that are returnable as part of the order, swaps, or claims

items.description: The details of the line items that belong to the order.

StoreCustomersListOrdersRes.description: The list of the customer's orders with pagination fields.

count.description: The total number of items available

offset.description: The number of orders skipped when retrieving the orders.

limit.description: The number of items per page

StoreCompleteCartRes.description: If the cart is completed successfully, this will have the created order or the swap's details, based on the cart's type. Otherwise, it'll be the cart's details.

type.description: The type of the data property. If the cart completion fails, type will be `cart` and the data object will be the cart's details. If the cart completion is successful and the cart is used for checkout, type will be `order` and the data object will be the order's details. If the cart completion is successful and the cart is used for swap creation, type will be `swap` and the data object will be the swap's details.

data.description: The data of the result object. Its type depends on the type field.

PaymentSession46.title: Payment Session
PaymentSession46.description: A Payment Session is created when a Customer initilizes the checkout flow, and can be used to hold the state of a payment flow. Each Payment Session is controlled by a Payment Provider, which is responsible for the communication with external payment services. Authorized Payment Sessions will eventually get promoted to Payments to indicate that they are authorized for payment processing such as capture or refund. Payment sessions can also be used as part of payment collections.

cart_id.description: The ID of the cart that the payment session was created for.

provider_id.description: The ID of the Payment Provider that is responsible for the Payment Session

is_selected.description: A flag to indicate if the Payment Session has been selected as the method that will be used to complete the purchase.

is_initiated.description: A flag to indicate if a communication with the third party provider has been initiated.

amount.description: The amount that the Payment Session has been authorized for.

payment_authorized_at.description: The date with timezone at which the Payment Session was authorized.

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

status.description: Indicates the status of the Payment Session. Will default to `pending`, and will eventually become `authorized`. Payment Sessions may have the status of `requires_more` to indicate that further actions are to be completed by the Customer.

data.description: The data required for the Payment Provider to identify, modify and process the Payment Session. Typically this will be an object that holds an id to the external payment session, but can be an empty object if the Payment Provider doesn't hold any state.

idempotency_key.description: Randomly generated key used to continue the completion of a cart in case of failure.

externalDocs.description: Learn more how to use the idempotency key.

PaymentCollection47.title: Payment Collection
PaymentCollection47.description: A payment collection allows grouping and managing a list of payments at one. This can be helpful when making additional payment for order edits or integrating installment payments.

description.description: Description of the payment collection

amount.description: Amount of the payment collection.

authorized_amount.description: Authorized amount of the payment collection.

region_id.description: The ID of the region this payment collection is associated with.

created_by.description: The ID of the user that created the payment collection.

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

deleted_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was deleted.

type.description: The type of the payment collection

status.description: The type of the payment collection

currency_code.description: The three character ISO code for the currency this payment collection is associated with.

externalDocs.description: See a list of codes.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

payments.description: The details of the payments created as part of the payment collection.

payment_sessions.description: The details of the payment sessions created as part of the payment collection.

OrderItemChange48.title: Order Item Change
OrderItemChange48.description: An order item change is a change made within an order edit to an order's items. These changes are not reflected on the original order until the order edit is confirmed.

order_edit_id.description: The ID of the order edit

order_edit.description: The details of the order edit the item change is associated with.

original_line_item_id.description: The ID of the original line item in the order

line_item_id.description: The ID of the cloned line item.

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

deleted_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was deleted.

type.description: The order item change's status

OrderEdit49.title: Order Edit
OrderEdit49.description: Order edit allows modifying items in an order, such as adding, updating, or deleting items from the original order. Once the order edit is confirmed, the changes are reflected on the original order.

order_id.description: The ID of the order that is edited

order.description: The details of the order that this order edit was created for.

internal_note.description: An optional note with additional details about the order edit.
examples: Included two more items B to the order.

created_by.description: The unique identifier of the user or customer who created the order edit.

requested_by.description: The unique identifier of the user or customer who requested the order edit.

requested_at.description: The date with timezone at which the edit was requested.

confirmed_by.description: The unique identifier of the user or customer who confirmed the order edit.

confirmed_at.description: The date with timezone at which the edit was confirmed.

declined_by.description: The unique identifier of the user or customer who declined the order edit.

declined_at.description: The date with timezone at which the edit was declined.

declined_reason.description: An optional note why  the order edit is declined.

canceled_by.description: The unique identifier of the user or customer who cancelled the order edit.

canceled_at.description: The date with timezone at which the edit was cancelled.

shipping_total.description: The total of the shipping amount

gift_card_total.description: The total of the gift card amount

gift_card_tax_total.description: The total of the gift card tax amount

total.description: The total amount of the edited order.

difference_due.description: The difference between the total amount of the order and total amount of edited order.

payment_collection_id.description: The ID of the payment collection

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

status.description: The status of the order edit.

items.description: The details of the cloned items from the original order with the new changes. Once the order edit is confirmed, these line items are associated with the original order.

changes.description: The details of all the changes on the original order's line items.

ReturnItem50.title: Return Item
ReturnItem50.description: A return item represents a line item in an order that is to be returned. It includes details related to the return and the reason behind it.

return_id.description: The ID of the Return that the Return Item belongs to.

item_id.description: The ID of the Line Item that the Return Item references.

return_order.description: Details of the Return that the Return Item belongs to.

quantity.description: The quantity of the Line Item to be returned.

is_requested.description: Whether the Return Item was requested initially or received unexpectedly in the warehouse.

requested_quantity.description: The quantity that was originally requested to be returned.

received_quantity.description: The quantity that was received in the warehouse.

reason_id.description: The ID of the reason for returning the item.

note.description: An optional note with additional details about the Return.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

Return51.title: Return
Return51.description: A Return holds information about Line Items that a Customer wishes to send back, along with how the items will be returned. Returns can also be used as part of a Swap or a Claim.

swap_id.description: The ID of the swap that the return may belong to.

swap.description: The details of the swap that the return may belong to.

claim_order_id.description: The ID of the claim that the return may belong to.

claim_order.description: The details of the claim that the return may belong to.

order_id.description: The ID of the order that the return was created for.

order.description: The details of the order that the return was created for.

location_id.description: The ID of the stock location the return will be added back.

refund_amount.description: The amount that should be refunded as a result of the return.

no_notification.description: When set to true, no notification will be sent related to this return.

received_at.description: The date with timezone at which the return was received.

created_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was created.

updated_at.description: The date with timezone at which the resource was updated.

status.description: Status of the Return.

shipping_data.description: Data about the return shipment as provided by the Fulfilment Provider that handles the return shipment.

idempotency_key.description: Randomly generated key used to continue the completion of the return in case of failure.

externalDocs.description: Learn more how to use the idempotency key.

metadata.description: An optional key-value map with additional details

externalDocs.description: Learn about the metadata attribute, and how to delete and update it.

items.description: The details of the items that the customer is returning.
